name: Modeler randomforest
tagline: Classification and regression based on a forest of trees using random inputs, utilizing conditional inference trees as base learners.
body: # Model for Random Forest ###IBM SPSS Modeler Predictive Extensions Node for classification and regression based on a forest of trees using random inputs, utilizing conditional inference trees as base learners. Simply install the node, choose the target and predictors and specify additional settings. ![Map](https://github.com/IBMPredictiveAnalytics/Modeler_RandomForest/blob/master/Screenshot/Illustration2.png?raw=true) --- License ---- [Apache 2.0][1] Contributors ---- - Armand Ruiz ([armand_ruiz](https://twitter.com/armand_ruiz)) [1]: http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0.html
